caption.title: Distributional shift associated with southeastern United States.
caption.p: Distributional plots comparing the shifts between the D 0 condition and the average climate for the southeastern region of the United States. ( A) We compare the period of 1965–2014 relative to a baseline period of 1902–1951 with the observed CRU data. cdf, cumulative distribution function. ( B) We compare the future period of 2050–2099 relative to the historical baseline of 1951–2000 with the CMIP5 model average ensemble.
